# Victor Jimenez â€” Portfolio

> Enterprise Technical Lead & Engineer with 13+ years delivering high-scale Drupal & WordPress platforms.

## About

Victor Jimenez is a full-stack developer and AI innovator specializing in CMS migrations, performance hardening, web accessibility (WCAG AA), and decoupled architectures (React/Next.js with Drupal/WordPress APIs). Creator of VictorStack AI, a 24/7 autonomous intelligence that monitors the Drupal and WordPress ecosystems.

## Expertise

- CMS Migrations: legacy CMS and WordPress multisite migrations with repeatable pipelines
- Performance: Varnish, Redis, CDNs, Core Web Vitals optimization
- Accessibility: WCAG AA audits, semantic HTML, ARIA compliance
- Decoupled Architecture: React/Next.js frontends with Drupal/WordPress APIs
- AI Agents: autonomous coding, monitoring, and self-healing systems

## Notable Work

57+ client projects including HBO Max, Cartoon Network, Sonesta Hotels, Inter-American Development Bank, and university platforms.
